title: MD
biography: Phil Gersh was an American talent and literary agent, who established an agency known as The Gersh Agency in 1949, based in Beverly Hills, California, and New York City, representing stars including Humphrey Bogart, David Niven and Richard Burton. He was considered one of the last links between Hollywood's Golden Age and today's corporate-owned movie business.
aiSummary: Bernard J. Gersh is a clinical cardiology specialist with an H-index of 185 at Mayo Clinic (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet, Journal of Polymer Science. Based in United States.
